creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Fringe with warp-twined heading (LM), ikat and pieced, printed band, No backing cloth. Pieced handwoven red wool ground with wool embroidery. The top edge is bound with wool. There is applied wool fringe on the other three sides. No backing is present. Fringe in sections of different colors; green, gold, tan and pink.
medium: Wool, silk; spaced buttonhole-filling stitch, checkered chain stitch, needle chain stitch
title: Ilgich
